body: There is nothing to stop you from that. The set-up is very similar and you only need to run an energy simulation for each option instead of daylighting. I used Honeybee to run all the examples you see here in [DesignExplorer](http://tt-acm.github.io/DesignExplorer/) both for daylighting and energy simulations.
